GET /api.description: Retrieves a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/topics.description: Retrieves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: Adds a topic object with the newly added topic

topic.description: Here's a shoutout to all you Great British Bake-Off Enthusiasts

POST /api/articles.description: Posts an article object, even if article_img_url is not provided

GET /api/articles.description: Retrieves an array of all articles, which can be filtered by topic or author and sorted by a specified column

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: Deletes an article by its article ID, including all associated comments, and responds with no content (204).

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Retrieves an article object relevant to the provided article_id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Retrieves an array of comments relevant to the provided article_id, each containing a comment_id, votes, author, body, created_at, and article_id

GET /api/users.description: Retrieves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: Retrieves an object of the user relevant to the provided username

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Creates and returns a comment object for the relevant article_id

comment.author: weegembump
comment.body: I love League of Legends, especially as it's from hit show Arcane!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an article object and returns the updated article object

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates a comment's vote count and returns the updated comment object

comment.author: icellusedkars
comment.body: I hate streaming eyes even more

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by its ID. Responds with no content (204).
